"Partner's Friendship Level":
"If you clear a quest with a partner character, or if you complete one of their Client Orders, that character's Friendship Level will go up.

Your partner's Friendship Level can be found in the Campship from the \"Partner List\" at the \"Partner Terminal\"."

"As your partner's Friendship Level goes up, the \"Present Gauge\" will also go up.

When the \"Present Gauge\" maxes out, that character will give you their present.

When a \"present icon\" is shown above a character's head, speak to them and select \"Talk\" to receive the present."
